column2: Role & responsibilities    Positive relationships with vendors of direct travel, such as car rentals, hotels, and airlines.  Negotiate preferred rates with vendors of direct travel.  Travel accommodations, booking flights, hotels, car rentals, and coordinating activities.   Manage and process all travel-related documentation, including payments, itineraries, visas, medical, and legal forms.  Assist with any travel-related issues that may arise.  Research travel deals and evaluate prices and services.  Arrange travel accommodations for business visitors.  Prepare travel budget reports.   Analyze and prepare reports on travel expenses. Travel tickets [Flight, Train, bus], Visa, Passport, etc. Hotel booking Guest relationship mgt. Organize meetings, conferences, seminars, etc.    Preferred candidate profile   Educational Qualification - Any Graduate Experience - 2 to 8 Years   If interested kindly share your resume to  recruitment1@mdindia.com  with below required details- Total Experience- Relevant Experience- Current CTC- Expected CTC- Current Company- Current Designation- Reason for leaving-  Notice Period- Current Location-

column2: Role & responsibilities   Handling online inbound travel leads from the countries like UK, South Africa, Singapore etc. over the phone calls, chats or emails related to customized holiday packages. Creating the end-to-end tailor-made Itinerary, costing, and negotiating with the suppliers. Regular follow-up with the clients and ensure the closer of sale. Candidates should have good connections with different suppliers in India (Hotels, Transporters, and Others). Perks and Benefits   Monthly incentives

column2: Role & responsibilities   Roles:   We are looking for a Package Tour Executive to join our dynamic team. Our Travel Consultants provide exceptional service to corporate and leisure travelers, ensuring that their trip is as enjoyable and stress-free as possible. The successful candidate will be an organized, friendly, and knowledgeable individual who is passionate about helping clients get the most out of their travel experience. They will be a team player with a desire to be part of a successful travel business.  The ideal candidate will possess a minimum of one year of experience in the travel industry, along with excellent customer service skills. They should also have a strong understanding of the travel industry, including airline reservations, hotel bookings, car rental, and reimbursement processes. Responsibilities: Provide exceptional customer service to corporate and leisure travelers Assist customers in customizing FITs, preparing itineraries, booking, hotels, car rentals, and other travel-related services Ensure customer satisfaction throughout the entire travel process Stay up-to-date on industry trends and new travel options Respond to customer inquiries and complaints in a timely and professional manner Research and suggest cost-effective travel solutions Process customer payments and reimbursements accurately and efficiently Maintain customer records and other travel documents Assist customers with any other travel-related needs or questions Work collaboratively with other Travel Consultants and departments to meet customer needs and ensure a successful travel experience
column11: Outbound Tours, Itinerary, International Travel, Inbound Tours, Destination Management, Tourism, Holiday Packages, Negotiation, Sales, Travel Management, Tour Packages, Hotel Booking

Candidate should have excellent communication and interpersonal Skill. Educational Qualification: Graduated & Above, Preference Will be given To Diploma in Tourism & Travel Management, IATA, etc.

column1: We're Hiring For Travel Consultant!!! - Travel Executive - Puducherry
column2: Coordinate travel arrangements for clients or employees. Book flights, accommodations, and transportation. Handle changes or issues during travel. Utilize excellent organizational skills. Pay close attention to detail. Work efficiently under pressure. Communicate effectively with clients, vendors, and team members. Ensure smooth travel experiences for all parties involved.

Job Summary We are a growing new-age travel company, known to create unforgettable holidays around the world. If you are passionate about travelling, enjoy planning, know your way around a computer as well as the world, work to targets and channel your enthusiasm to give customers the best experience imaginable, then we are looking for someone like you. This role based in Kolkata is for a dynamic, energetic, creative, customer obsessed person used to deliver outstanding results. Responsibilities and Duties Design, develop and plan products/ itineraries in line with needs of modern-day travelers. Handle end-to-end travel arrangements (airlines, hotels, experiences, visas, etc.). Interact with clients over the phone, email, offering sound advice and information related to products and destinations. Convert customer enquiries into bookings and generate revenue for the organization. Maximize profitability through negotiation with suppliers over prices and rates Deliver outstanding levels of customer service with a view to exceed customer expectations. Provide regular reporting to management. Organize and attend tourism events, conferences, workshops, seminars and exhibitions. Constantly update/modify holiday experiences based on customer feedback. Key Skills Exceptional communication skills in English , Travel Arrangements, Travel Coordination, Sales, Customer Service, Customer Relations, Customer Relationship Management, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, international travel Required Experience and Qualifications Exceptional written/verbal communication skills in English is required Energetic, confident, innovative. Strong customer orientation Should be well travelled or experienced in international travel management. Should have an entrepreneurial spirit and be able to work independently. Ability to operate in a fast-paced environment and work under pressure. Thorough knowledge of operations in a travel management company. Experience in budget and cost management Ability to operate in a fast paced environment and work under pressure. Qualifications and Experience Post-graduate preferred. However if you are a smart, confident graduate and passionate about travel then you are welcome to apply. Minimum 5 years of experience in frontline sales/customer service in the travel industry will be preferred. If you have travelled the globe and understand the nuances of international travel but havent worked in the travel industry, we would like to hear from you too. Benefits Attractive performance incentives, Medical insurance on confirmation.

column2: Roles and Responsibilities   - Tour Planning: Develop comprehensive tour itineraries, including accommodation, transportation, sightseeing and other activities. - Logistics Coordination: Coordinating all logistical aspects of tours, including accommodation bookings , dinner arrangements, etc. - Quality Assurance: Ensure the highest quality and safety are maintained throughout the tour, adhering to industry regulations and company policies.
